text: Hey team, looking to work with Michael Rodriguez for Bed Bath N' Table. Budget is approx $16,695 - need 2 x Behind-the-scenes content, 3 x 10-minute unboxing, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x YouTube video, 2 x Facebook post. 12 weeks exclusivity, 3 month engagement. Usage: 10 months. Start date: October 2025.
